name: Attuned_Scrappers_Strike_F
display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. Increases your chance to critically hit with all of your primary powers against players and minions by 2% and boosts your chance to critically hit by 4% against most other enemies and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%. This enhancement can only be slotted by Scrappers and may be slotted into any Scrapper damage power.
power_short_helps: Increases Attack Rate, Critical Hit Chance Increase
